name: The Vengeance of Chickens
description:
The Vengeance of Chickens is an arcade-y sort of game where you are not the hero. You're an angry chicken.  Direct your flock to take out everyone, hero and villain alike, and get a high score! Make them pay!

And don't forget to post your best high scores in the comments!

Controls

  • [WASD/Left Joystick] - Move Player
  • [Arrows/Right Joystick] - Move Target
  • [Z/A (Xbox)/Cross (PS)/B (Switch)] - Attack, requires chickens. Skip intro cutscene
  • [X/B (Xbox)/Circle (PS)/A (Switch)] - Recall Target
  • [ESC/Start] - Pause

Credits
(please see "Credits!" in game)
